message: I mean, seriously...think about it: When was the last time protestors on the Right rioted, looted, threw rocks at Cops & burned down local businesses? When? When? When? How about never. It's only the babies on the Left who always block traffic, injure Cops & damage private property when they don't get their way. These protestors should be dumped in Syria, Yemen or even Germany for a few weeks. Maybe then they'd realize how good they have it here. Probably not.

If anything, evolution is evidence of a divine order. There really isn't any other way for it to have worked. Random chance is too random to have worked so well so quickly. People that truly understand science are some of the most certain of us that there is a God, a creator, an artificer. If the beauty of creating a world like ours over billions of years isn't more powerful to you than doing it in seven days, you need to reevaluate your perspective.

Well, matcha IS green tea... just powdered. Personally, I like to mix a little of it into my green tea leaves before steeping. The leaves and matcha together really work to each bring out the flavor in the other. Also, baking with matcha is the bomb. Homemade green tea cheesecake is crazy tasty.
